entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
